kDesc
If you send this to your friends, you have to warn them. The paintballs are flying, run, RUUUUUNNNNNNNN!!!! \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
Si vous envoyez cela à vos amis, vous devez les avertir. Les boules de peintures fusent, courrez, COURREEEEZ !!! \n\n Créé par Double Time – Jouez pour Gagner, Jouez avec Double Time. [#Legal]
Wenn du deinen Freunden das sendest, musst du sie warnen. Die Paintballs fliegen, lauft weg, LAAAAAUUUUUUUUFT!!!! \n\n Entwickelt von Double Time – Spiele auf Sieg, Setze auf Double Time. [#Legal]
Se le invii ai tuo amici, non dimenticare di avvertirli. Attento alle paintball, corri, COOORRRIIIII!!!\n\n Una creazione Double Time – Gioca per vincere, gioca con Double Time. [#Legal]
Antes de enviarle este regalo a tus amigos, adviérteles para que no acaben pringados en pintura.\n\n Un producto de Double Time, equipamiento para divertirte. [#Legal]
이 아이템을 보낼 때는 먼저 경고를 해 주십시오. 페인트볼이 날아 다니니까, 피하라구요.\n\n Double Time 제작 - 승리를 위한 플레이, 플레이 Double Time. [#Legal]
If you send this to your friends, you have to warn them. The paintballs are flying, run, RUUUUUNNNNNNNN!!!! \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
